metatags.name: sdg-tag
metatags.description: The sdg-tag will contain the text sdg identifying the page as part of the Single Digital Gateway

metatags.name: DC.ISO3166
metatags.description: It will contain the two characters ISO 3166-1 representation of names of countries

metatags.name: DC.location
metatags.description: Describes the NUTS or LAU location id for which the content on the page is valid (http://purl.org/dc/terms/Location)

metatags.name: DC.service
metatags.description: It will contain the information about the type of content present on the page (http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/Service)

metatags.name: policy-code
metatags.description: It will contain the information about the code of the content area covered by the page according to Annex I and II or the full name of the assistance service in Annex III

metatags.name: DC.Policy
metatags.description: It will contain the information about the name  of the content area covered by the page according to Annex I and II (http://purl.org/dc/terms/Policy)
